title: Anxiety Self-Reflection
description: Explore current triggers, coping mechanisms, and support needs related to your anxiety.

questions.prompt: When do you notice anxious feelings arise most often?
What physical signals let you know anxiety is building?
Which coping strategies feel supportive in the moment?
Who can you reach out to when you need reassurance or grounding?
What is one small step you can take this week to nurture calm?
